nlacp: If a patient or Personal Progress Officer has completed only one survey on satisfaction with the doctor's visit as an office assignment, the patient may not complete the survey during a visit to the doctor.

truth.subject: patient
truth.condition: patient or personal progress officer has completed only one survey on satisfaction with the doctors visit as an office assignment

pred.subject: patient
pred.condition: patient or personal progress officer has completed only one survey on satisfaction with the doctors visit as an office assignment
